Des Paroz

Moorish Idol on the Bottom Of The Channel

04 Aug 2010

Moorish Idol on the Bottom Of The Channel, originally uploaded by BlueBeyond.

I've always loved these beautiful fish that are generally seen in pairs on tropical reefs, and occasionally in warmer months on temperate reefs around Sydney.

They are a graceful fish that are a little timid.

Made at the divesite called BOTCH (Bottom Of The CHannel) at Uepi in September 2009.
